name: My Craft Studio Professional File
summary: Learn about .MCSX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: While MCSX files are created by the Professional version of My Craft Studio, .MCSP files are created by the standard version of the software. The Professional version can open both file types.

description: An MCSX file is a card design project file created by My Craft Studio Professional, an application used for making paper and card designs. It contains the images, text, effects, and page layout information that comprise the design. MCSX files are used for greeting cards, stationery, and other paper designs.
